# The `SectionRef` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is a value type class that represents a single section in the list of sections in the object file. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SectionRef</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This is a value type class that represents a single section in the list of sections in the object file.

Definition at line 81 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/objectfile-h">ObjectFile.h</a>.

### getRelocatedSection() {#afefc9a6c50666179dc43c56745fd0785}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; section&#95;iterator &gt; llvm::object::SectionRef::getRelocatedSection () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns the related section if this section contains relocations.

The returned section may or may not have applied its relocations.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/objectfile-h/#l00139">139</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/objectfile-h">ObjectFile.h</a>.

### isBerkeleyData() {#ae11a73c8ca0835a464fae89951a172c6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::object::SectionRef::isBerkeleyData () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Whether this section will be placed in the data segment, according to the Berkeley size format.

This is true if the section is allocatable and contains data (e.g. PROGBITS), but is not text.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/objectfile-h/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/objectfile-h">ObjectFile.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isBerkeleyText() {#a9acc251112b12a0f3523aba93a27ca04}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::object::SectionRef::isBerkeleyText () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Whether this section will be placed in the text segment, according to the Berkeley size format.

This is true if the section is allocatable, and contains either code or readonly data.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/objectfile-h/#l00120">120</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/object/objectfile-h">ObjectFile.h</a>.
